column8: Description
LANDMARK: Units controlled by the owner of this Landmark gain +200 DEF when in deffense position.
LANDMARK: Gain 1 extra mana gem at the beginning of your turn.
Rush.
When Summoned: Heal your LP by 100.
This unit cannot attack. Gain 1 extra mana gem at the beginning of your turn.
When this unit is destroyed by battle: Deal 100 damage to any player LP.
Reduce all combat damage this unit takes by 100.
If this unit takes damage and survives, it permanently gains +100 DEF.
When Summoned: Target an enemy unit. It gets -200 ATK this turn.
End of Turn: Choose a friendly unit and give it +100 DEF. If there are no damaged friendly cards, heal your LP by 200 instead.
When summoned: Other friendly northern units gain +100 DEF.
When summoned: Adjacent friendly units gain +200 DEF.
When Summoned: Strike an enemy in their region.
While this unit is on the field, you opponent cannot attack other units you control.
When Summoned: Give all other friendly units +200 ATK Or +200 DEF this round and heal your LP by 200.
Pierce. When this unit destroys an enemy unit by battle, heal your LP by 200. If you have 10 remaining mana in total, this unit gains +200 ATK.
Cannot be affected by enemy Spells or Traps.
End of Turn: Grant one adjacent friendly unit +100 DEF.
Pierce. Gets +100 ATK +100 DEF for each other friendly Northern unit on the field.
When Summoned: Summon one 300 ATK / 100 DEF"Mountain Goat" Token.
(This is a Token, not a main deck card).
When Summoned: Give a friendly unit +200 ATK.
The first time this unit would be destroyed each turn, it is not. Reset its health to 500. Damage calculation is applied normally.
When a Spell affects this unit, heal your LP by 200.
Heal a target unit or your LP by 200.
Give a friendly unit +300 DEF this turn.
Switch the ATK and DEF of a unit you control.
Give an enemy unit -300 ATK.
Heal a target unit or your LP by 400.
Deal 400 damage to a taget unit.
Choose a friendly unit. It cannot be targeted by enemy cards or effects and cannot take damage this turn.
Give a friendly unit a permanent +100 ATK and +300 DEF.
Heal your LP by 500 and draw a card.
Summon two 200 ATK / 200 DEF "Wolf" Tokens. If you control the "Pack Alpha Wolf" give the "Wolf" tokens +200 ATK.
Rush. Pierce. (This is a Token, not a main deck card).
All friendly units gain +100 ATK and  200 DEF.
Heal your LP by 800.
Summmon a Landmark from your deck into any Landmark-zone.
When an enemy unit declares an attack: the attacking unit gets -400 ATK this turn.
When an enemy unit declares an attack:  Negate the attack and end the Battle Phase.
Negate a Spell or Trap effect and destroy it.
When you would take combat damage to your LP: Reduce that damage by 500.
When your opponent summons a second unit in a single turn: Return that unit to its owner's hand.
When a friendly unit is targeted for an attack: Give that unit +500 DEF this turn.
At the start of an opponent's Battle Phase: All friendly units gain +200 DEF this turn.
LANDMARK: Once per round, during your Main Phase: If you control only units with Shadow or no units, you gain 2 extra mana this turn and draw 1 card.

LANDMARK: Once per round: when an opponent activates a Spell Card, the controller of this Landmark may reveal a Spell or Trap from their hand. shuffle it into deck and pay 3 mana. If you do, negate the Spell or copy the effect of the Spell to a target of your choise.
When Summoned: Draw 1 card.
Pierce. When you activate or copy the effect of a Spell, this unit gets +100 ATK.
Shadow. When a Landmark is summoned or moved, this unit gains +200 ATK and +200 DEF
Your Spells can be activated as if they were Traps.
Shadow. Rush. Cannot be targeted by enemy Spells or Traps while it is attacking.
When Summoned: Search your deck for a Spell/Trap card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Shadow. Once per round, during your Main Phase: Switch 2 Landmarks on the field.
The first time you play a Spell/Trap each turn, this unit gets +100 ATK +100 DEF.
When Summoned: Look at an opponent's hand and draw one of the cards.
Your Landmark and Set Spell/Trap cards cannot be affected by enemy cards.
When you activate a Spell/Trap card or a Landmark is affected by a card effect: Draw 1 card.
When Summoned: Summon a "Shadow Clone" Token with a chosen unit's ATK.
Shadow. Rush.
When Summoned: You can pay an additional 2 mana to destroy a unit with 500 or less ATK.
When this unit attacks: You may re 1 Spell card or Landmark from your Graveyard to your hand.
When Summoned: Place one Landmark from any players graveyard into any players Landmark zone
When Summoned: Return all Spell/Traps on the field to their owners hands.
To activate a Spell or Trap, opponents must pay 400LP.
Shadow. This unit is immune to damage from Spells and Traps.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and place them back on top in any order.
Target a friendly unit. Give it Shadow this turn.
Add one Spell or Trap from your deck to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Deal 200 damage to an enemy unit. If you played another Spell/Trap this turn, deal 400 damage instead.
Change the target of an enemy Spell/Trap that targets a single unit to another valid target.
Draw 1 card.
The next Spell you play this turn is copied.
Steal one random card from an opponents hand.
Destroy one  Landmark.
Draw 2 cards.
Destroy one enemy unit. You take 300 damage.
Shuffle 3 Spells/Traps from your Graveyard into your deck, then draw 1 card.
Return an enemy unit to its owner's hand.
Shuffle all active Landmarks and place them randomly on the field.
Become immune to attack, Spells and Traps for 1 round.
When an enemy unit declares an attack on a friendly unit: The attack now targets your LP instead.
When an enemy unit attacks: That unit gets -300 ATK and -300 DEF this turn.
When your opponent targets exactly one card you control with a Spell or Trap. Effect: Change the target to another valid card.
When an opponent declares their Battle Phase: Enemy units cannot attack your LP directly this turn.
When a friendly unit is targeted by an attack or enemy effect: Return that unit to your hand.
When your opponent activates a Spell that deals damage: Negate the Spell and deal the damage to the opponent's LP instead.
When your opponent Summons a unit: Summon a Shadow Clone Token with that units attack.
When activated: The active opponent can only play one more card (Unit, Spell, or Trap) this turn.
When an enemy unit activates its effect: Destroy that unit.
When a friendly unit declares an attack: That unit can attack the opponent's LP directly this turn.
Copy the effect of a Trap card in your graveyard.
During your Main Phase: Destroy any number of other Spell/Trap cards you control. For each card destroyed, heal 300 LP.
When your opponent Summons a unit with 800 or more ATK. Effect: Destroy that unit.
When an attack would reduce your LP to 0: Your LP become 100 instead. Then, destroy all units you control and end the Batlle Phase.
LANDMARK: When a Western units effect is activated in this region, the effect is acitivated twice.
LANDMARK: When a unit is returned from to your hand gain 1 mana.
When Summoned: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.
Once per round, during your Main Phase: You can apply the effect of another card on the field, to this card, for the rest of the turn.
When Summoned: Give another friendly unit +100 ATK and +100 DEF.
When Summoned: Look at all of an opponent's Set cards in their Spell & Trap Zone.
When Summoned: Return another friendly unit you control to your hand. You gain 2 additional mana this turn.
Once per round, during your Main Phase: Target an enemy unit. It cannot attack during your opponent's next turn.
Once per turn: When another friendly unit is destroyed or returned to your hand gain 1 mana.
When Summoned: Silence an enemy unit.
Rush
When a unit is added to your hand, reduce its cost by 1 this turn and gain 1 mana.
Shadow.
When Summoned: Return one unit with 400 ATK or less to its owner's hand.
When Summoned: Summon one 500 ATK / 300 DEF "Tiger" Token.
(This is a Token, not a main deck card).
Once per round, during your Main Phase: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and put the other on the bottom of the deck.
When this unit attacks: Give another friendly unit +200 ATK this turn.
When Summoned: Choose one - Return a friendly unit to your hand OR Return an enemy unit to its owner's hand. If you choose a friendly unit, gain 3 additional mana this turn.
This unit can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
While this unit is on the field, you opponent cannot attack other units you control or your LP.
When Summoned: Deal 300 damage to up to two target enemy units.
When this unit destroys an enemy unit by Battleand survives: Search your deck for a Western unit and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Once per round, during your Main Phase: Summon one unit from your Graveyard to your side of the field. Its effects are negated.
When Summoned: Destroy all other units on the field with 300 ATK or less.
When Summoned: if you have 5 or more mana in total, draw a card.
Once per round, during your Main Phase: Return one friendly unit to your hand.
When Summoned: If you control another Western unit, gain 1 additional mana and draw 1 card.
Rush. When this unit deals combat damage to an opponent's LP: Return it to your hand.
When Summoned: Destroy one enemy Landmark or switch their Landmark with your own.
If you control another unit with 600 or more DEF, this unit gains +300 ATK.
Return a friendly unit you control to your hand.
Choose a friendly unit in your Graveyard that was destroyed this turn. Add it to your hand.
Choose a unit. Swap its current ATK and DEF until the end of the turn.
Choose a friendly unit. Remove all temporary effects from it and fully heal it..
Choose a friendly unit. It copies the printed effect text of another target unit on the field until end of turn.
Switch two Landmarks.
Silence an enemy unit.
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may summon one Western unit from among them, ignoring its Cost. Shuffle the rest back into your deck.
Choose a friendly unit. It permanently gains the printed effects and keywords of another friendly unit on the field (in addition to its own).
Draw 2 cards. Then, choose a card from your hand and place it on the bottom of your deck.
Give a friendly unit a permanent +200 ATK and +200 DEF. If it is a Western unit with a 'When Summoned' effect, trigger that effect again.
Choose a friendly unit. All other friendly units gain ATK equal to half the chosen unit's base ATK this turn (rounded down).
Search your deck for a unit card with a 'When Summoned' effect, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
When your opponent Summons a unit: Return that unit to its owner's hand.
When your opponent activates a unit's ability: Negate that ability's effect.
When a friendly unit is targeted by an enemy Spell, Trap, or unit effect: Change the target to this card, then destroy this card.
When a friendly unit is destroyed by battle: Summon one unit with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.
When an enemy unit declares an attack: The attacking unit cannot attack during your opponent's next turn.
When a friendly unit is targeted by an enemy Spell or Trap: Destroy that Spell/Trap card and negate its effect.
When your opponent activates a unit's ability: A friendly unit of your choice gains ATK and DEF equal to the cost of that unit x100.
LANDMARK: When a southern unit in ATK position fights a non-southern unit in this region, the non-southern unit is destroyed after damage calculation.
LANDMARK: Southern units gain +200 ATK when fighting in this region.
Rush.
When Summoned: Deal 100 damage to all opponents' LP.
Rush.
When this unit is destroyed by battle: Deal 100 damage to the unit that destroyed it.
When Summoned: Give another friendly unit +200 ATK this turn.
Rush.
Pierce.
When another friendly unit attacks: Deal 100 damage to the defending player's LP.
End of your turn: Deal 200 damage to ALL players LP.
Pierce. This unit takes double damage from combat.
When Summoned: Deal 200 damage to an enemy unit.
End of your Turn: Deal 100 damage to ALL other units (including friendly).
Rush. This unit must attack each turn if able.
When Summoned: Deal 100 damage to all enemy units.
When Summoned: Friendly Southern units gain +100 ATK.
When this unit attacks: Destroy one random Set card in the defending player's Spell & Trap Zone.
When Summoned: Give all other friendly southern units Pierce this turn.
Pierce. When this unit deals combat damage to an opponent's LP: Deal an additional 300 damage.
Rush. When destroyed: If this unit dealt damage to an opponent's LP while attacking in this turn, return this card to your hand.
Pierce.
When this unit destroys an enemy unit by battle, it can make a second attack this turn.
When this unit deals damage to an opponent's LP: Draw 1 card.
When Summoned: Switch 2 active Landmarks or move one Landmark to another empty Landmark slot.
Rush.
Whenever another unit (friend or foe) is destroyed, give this unit a permanent +100 ATK buff.
When you play a Spell: Deal 100 damage to an opponent of your choice.
Give a friendly unit +300 ATK this turn.
Deal 100 damage to an enemy unit.
Give all attacking friendly units +100 ATK this turn.
Deal 300 damage to an enemy unit or an opponent's LP.
Choose a friendly unit and an enemy unit. They Battle immediately in a region of your choice.
Deal 400 damage to a damaged enemy unit.
Give an enemy unit -200 ATK this turn.
LANDMARK: When the owner of this Landmark activates a Spell or Trap, that player looses 200LP. If it is a Spell that deals damage it deals an additional 200LP.
Give a friendly unit +300 ATK and +100 DEF
Deal 200 damage to two different units.
All friendly units gain +200 ATK.
Draw 2 cards. Take 200 damage.
Deal 600 damage to an enemy unit. Take 200 damage to your LP.
When your opponent Summons a unit with 500 or more ATK: Destroy that unit.
When an enemy unit declares an attack: Deal 200 damage to the attacking unit.
When an enemy activates a Spell, deal 400 to their LP.
When an enemy unit attacks your LP directly: Summon a 500 ATK / 200 DEF "Southern Warrior" Token to become the new target of the attack.
Shadow. (This is a Token, not a main deck card).
When a friendly unit is destroyed by battle: Deal 300 damage to the attacking player's LP.
When an enemy unit attacks: Deal damage to the attacking unit equal to its own ATK.
When your opponent Summons a unit that cost 5 or more. Deal 400 damage to all enemy units controlled by that opponent.
